page.title: 04Mr Patel the Dairy Farmer.
page.content: Mr. Patel is a contract herdsman who runs the{dairy farm}at{Cole {Green,Brent Pelham.}He has been a dairy farmer for{20 years.}There are {800 acres}on the estate with{250}acres of grassland. There are{150 milking {cows}and{150 followers.}In summer the cows eat the grass and in Winter they are fed silage, potato cakes, grain and sugar beat pulse. Mr. Patel enyoys his job in the summer. Milking is the most difficult part of the job, taking 5 hours every day. The cows are milked two times each day. Mr.Patel starts his day at 5.00am and finishes about 6.00pm but he can go on till much later when calving. If he were not a dairy farmer Mr.Patel would like to be a business man.
